channel.title: üè¢ Google DeepMind on AI Paper Reviews by AI
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Google DeepMind on AI Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: Deliberation in Latent Space via Differentiable Cache Augmentation
item.description: Frozen LLMs get a performance boost by augmenting their key-value cache with latent embeddings generated by a differentiable offline coprocessor.

item.title: Revisiting In-Context Learning with Long Context Language Models
item.description: Long-context models surprisingly show that simple random sampling of examples is as effective as sophisticated methods for in-context learning, shifting the focus to efficient context utilization.

item.title: LearnLM: Improving Gemini for Learning
item.description: LearnLM enhances Gemini for education by training it to follow pedagogical instructions, leading to significant preference improvements over GPT-40, Claude 3.5, and Gemini 1.5 Pro in diverse learning …

item.title: PaliGemma 2: A Family of Versatile VLMs for Transfer
item.description: PaliGemma 2: A family of versatile, open-weight VLMs achieving state-of-the-art results on various transfer tasks by scaling model size and resolution.

item.title: CAT4D: Create Anything in 4D with Multi-View Video Diffusion Models
item.description: CAT4D: Create realistic 4D scenes from single-view videos using a novel multi-view video diffusion model.
